record.field: Enter the Access Code from your Authentication App for %(login)s
WARNING - this Access Code has already been used, please enter the next Access Code for %(login)s
The TOTP secret for %(login)s must be a base32 encoded string, you can use the Generate Secret button to create a new secret.
The TOTP secret key for %(login)s is too short. You can use the Generate Secret button to create a secret key of the right length.
